description: Single storey side/rear infill extension; roof extension to rear (main) roofslope incorporating Juliet balcony; part rear roof extension to rear outrigger roofslope and installation of three rooflights
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990
| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number(s):
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing property

REASON: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with Policies 7.4 & 7.6 of The London Plan (Consolidated 2016)) and Policies 7.4, 7.6 and 7B of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013), polices 1.1 (k) and 1.2 (f) of the adopted Development (Core) Strategy (2013)
| No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies 7.4 and 7.6 of The London Plan (2016), polices 7.4, 7A & 7B of the Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and polices 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 2.1(c) and 2.10 Adopted Development (Core) Strategy 2012
